page.title: 13The Patrick Doody Clinic
page.content: The Patrick Doody Clinic is ten years old.It has two floors and a number of purpose built rooms,the largest of which is for the baby clinic which is held twice a week.There is a doctors' surgery,a dental clinic,a speech therapy clinic,an opticians and an audio unit as well as a reception,a kitchen and a playroom.The room used for hearing tests has double glazing, double doors and a thick carpet to make it soundproof.The playroom is used too by waiting children and has a slide and toys. There are twenty staff:7 health visitors,2 school nurses,2 nurse managers,a dentist,a speech therapist,an optician,an audiometrician,2 clerks,and a cleaner as well as visiting doctors taking surgery twice a week.
